summary: Completed comprehensive testing of M-Dental financial management app updates. All new features working correctly: M-Dental logo displays properly on login and sidebar, appointments CRUD functionality working with email notifications, invoice print functionality with M-Dental branding, mobile responsive patients page with card view, and role-based access control for staff/admin appointments access.

minor_issues.issue: Returns binary data instead of JSON response (expected behavior for file downloads)
minor_issues.impact: No functional impact - Excel export works correctly

passed_tests: M-Dental logo displays correctly on login page
M-Dental logo displays correctly in sidebar
Appointments page loads with patient list and scheduling functionality
Add appointment modal with patient selection, date/time inputs
Invoice print functionality with M-Dental branded preview
Print dialog with proper invoice details and clinic information
Patients page mobile responsive design with card view
Mobile card view shows patient avatars, clickable phone/email links
Desktop table hidden on mobile devices
Role-based access control working (staff has limited navigation)
Staff panel indicator shows correctly for staff users
All backend API endpoints working with 100% success rate
